clip.quote: Consistency always wins. Do the same thing every time.
clip.why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the importance of consistency in real estate processes.
clip.suggested_hook: Why consistency is the secret weapon in real estate success.

clip.quote: Non-refundable earnest money is unheard of in Arizona. That's why you get my offers accepted.
clip.why_clipworthy: Challenges conventional practices and offers a unique tactic for offer acceptance.
clip.suggested_hook: The unconventional tactic that gets offers accepted in Arizona.
